Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4273 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 5.15.131.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4273 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 5.15.131.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hyperv-daemons is earlier than 5.15.131.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-4273
